summary:
SpaceX, founded by Elon Musk, is an American space company aiming to make space travel more affordable. Based in Texas, it designs reusable rockets and spacecraft to reduce costs and enable a Mars colony. SpaceX launched the Falcon 9 and Falcon Heavy rockets and the Dragon spacecraft. They also provide internet service with Starlink, a large satellite network.

The company's Starship is a powerful, reusable rocket system for space travel. SpaceX achieved many firsts, including private orbital flights, spacecraft recovery, and vertical rocket landings. With over 300 successful Falcon 9 landings, SpaceX is valued at around $200 billion as of 2024.
title: SpaceX
